SourceProxy.name: ProcessIds
SourceProxy.label: Process Ids

Documentation.long_help: This filter generate point and cell data containing the current process id of each point and cell.

SourceProxy.Documentation: GenerateProcessIds is meant to fill in the ProcessIds attribute array, to know which processor owns which cells and points. It can generate it for both PointData and CellData. The ProcessIds array's name will be "PointProcessIds" for PointData, and "CellProcessIds" for CellData. Note that if the input is an HyperTree Grid instance, only cell process IDs are available.

IntVectorProperty.name: GeneratePointData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines whether to generate process id for points.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateCellData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines whether to generate process id for cells.

SourceProxy.name: GenerateProcessIds
SourceProxy.Deprecated: This has been replaced by 'ProcessIds'. Please consider using that instead.

SourceProxy.label: Remove Ghost Information
SourceProxy.name: RemoveGhostInformation
SourceProxy.Documentation: Removes ghost cells, point data and cell data ghost arrays. In the case of HyperTree Grid input, this filter removes the cell data ghost array and masks the ghost cells.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the remove ghost information filter. This filter operates on unstructured grids and polydata since it removes the ghost cells. It also supports HTGs, in which case it simply masks ghost cells.
